meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>person</kanji> <kanji>distinction</kanji> <kanji>finger</kanji> is the finger you use to point at people to distinguish them from other people. This is your <vocabulary>pointer finger</vocabulary>... your <vocabulary>index finger</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings are all the kun'yomi readings of everything. The word 人, the word 差す, and the word 指. Take your time with this one, it's kind of weird.
